rows.label: tev012901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Bates about the recently discovered survivor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Bates if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Bates about the recently discovered survivor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Bates about his BLADE companions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0001
rows.name:
They never report the news in much detail,
even when it's from the director general.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0002
rows.name:
I don't know anything about the survivor,
but I can't help but wonder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0003
rows.name:
I heard that [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] worked with Elma to kill the grexes
that were running wild outside the walls. If [ST:gender p1=he's p2=she's ] that
good of a fighter, [ST:gender p1=he'll p2=she'll ] probably end up in BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0004
rows.name:
And then, as a fellow recruit, we might end up being
rivals! I gotta get a look at this [ST:gender p1=guy p2=girl ], man.
I can't let [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] beat me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0007
rows.name:
Our team leader? Corwin? He's an adventurer through
and through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0008
rows.name:
Before all this, he once climbed Everest without bringing
any oxygen, and also explored a number of regions on
the Moon's surface. He's really an incredible guy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0009
rows.name:
I have a ton of respect for him, which is the whole
reason I joined his team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0010
rows.name:
But his second-in-command, Raleigh, and another guy
named Peter always treat me like I'm some amateur.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0011
rows.name:
Also, the captain yells at me all day long,
and the tasks they assign are insultingly simple.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0012
rows.name:
I wish they'd just accept me as a full member already.
I want to be a part of historic feats like the captain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0020
rows.name:
I wonder how that new crew member Elma discovered
has been doing since [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] got here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0021
rows.name:
Imagine waking up on this bizarre world and not
knowing anything about what's been going on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0022
rows.name:
And everyone's throwing around weird words like
"BLADE" and "Lifehold"? That's gotta take some
getting used to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0023
rows.name:
That's why I told Raleigh I wanted to talk to the new
recruit and give [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] a proper introduction to what
BLADE is all about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0024
rows.name:
Pretty nice of me, right? But Raleigh just said, "A scrub
like you is in no position to be teaching anyone about
anything." Then she ordered me to drop the idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0025
rows.name:
How long are they gonna treat me like I'm some
clueless kid? They could at least show me a shred
of the respect they show to every other BLADE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0040
rows.name:
That new member of Elma's team has only just joined
BLADE...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0041
rows.name:
But I hear [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] already brought down a xenoform fort
AND rescued a Nopon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0042
rows.name:
It galls me to say it, but [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ]'s pretty incredible.
Everyone on Team Corwin was blown away by how
much [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ]'s accomplished.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0043
rows.name:
And then Raleigh slithered up and told me,
"You're being outdone, stripling."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0044
rows.name:
Dammit! I can't let [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] beat me! I've got to pull off
some big mission to show Raleigh that I'm still on top![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Bates about himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Bates about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Bates about the enemy attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0045
rows.name:
It hasn't been that long since they found you,
and yet you've already accomplished so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0046
rows.name:
As the other new guy, that puts a lot of pressure
on me—and I'm falling further and further behind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0047
rows.name:
Today, some mysterious assailant attacked us in
Noctilum. The experience showed me how weak and
insufficient I actually am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0048
rows.name:
I'd like to think I'm better than you, but at this point...
Well, I know it's just not true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0049
rows.name:
But if you don't watch your back, I'm gonna overtake
you one of these days![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0052
rows.name:
We were lucky to have escaped with our lives, but...
Even now, it makes me shudder to think about him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0053
rows.name:
I don't know what sort of xenoform is piloting that
black Skell, but he's powerful. When he attacked us,
it's like we were bugs being stomped underfoot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0054
rows.name:
If Corwin and Raleigh hadn't come running over when
they did, I'd be a goner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0055
rows.name:
I can't believe how much trouble I've caused.
I need to get back on duty and find a way to
repay them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0056
rows.name:
I heard you were the one who drove off that Ryyz
woman.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0057
rows.name:
I can't believe this... It's not enough that you're beating
me—you just have to keep making it worse![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0058
rows.name:
But I'm not giving up. I'll overtake you one day.
I know I will.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0059
rows.name:
I'm gonna become the great BLADE that Corwin
always wanted to be![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask Bates about himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Bates about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_SEL0101
rows.name: Ask Bates about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0060
rows.name:
It hasn't been that long since they found you,
and yet you've already accomplished so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0061
rows.name:
As the other new guy, that puts a lot of pressure
on me—and I'm falling further and further behind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0062
rows.name:
And now, I even needed you to save me!
So I admit it—you're the better BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0063
rows.name:
But if you don't watch your back, I'm gonna overtake
you one of these days![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0066
rows.name:
When I got back, the captain told me to pull myself
together. ...Then he punched me right in the face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0067
rows.name:
That was the wake-up call I needed.
I'm getting back to work right away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0068
rows.name:
I know I caused a lot of trouble for Raleigh and the
captain, and that's a debt I need to repay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Bates about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_SEL3031
rows.name: Ask what Bates intends to do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_SEL3041
rows.name: Ask what Bates intends to do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0069
rows.name:
I wouldn't be alive today if it wasn't for you.
Thanks for showing me that incredible hiding place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0070
rows.name:
Corwin says that a good Pathfinder must understand
everything about his environment so he can always take
the optimal course of action.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0071
rows.name:
I guess you're proof of that. I gotta stop relying on
FrontierNav and start learning the lay of the land on
foot. Step by step, if needs be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0077
rows.name: Peter still calls me a "tenderfoot," but am I really?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0078
rows.name:
I mean, I went to Cauldros and came back alive.
If that doesn't make me a full-fledged Pathfinder,
I don't know what would.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0079
rows.name:
I'm gonna install tons of data probes and show him
who the tenderfoot really is. Then I'm gonna make
Team Corwin the top BLADE team in New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0092
rows.name:
You've done good work, but I never imagined you'd
be the one to find the Lifehold Core and take down
the Ganglion boss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0093
rows.name:
I guess I can't consider you my rival anymore.
I mean, you're waaay out of my league.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0094
rows.name:
But even Captain Corwin has started praising me.
He says I'm finally starting to "get my crap together."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012901_MSG0095
rows.name:
If I keep at it, I'll be carrying Team Corwin before you
know it.[ST:wait ]
